title: I Am Legend (2007) DvDrip (XviD).avi
description:
Director: Francis Lawrence

Release Date: 26 December 2007 (Norway) 

Genre: Drama / Horror / Sci-Fi / Thriller 

Main Actor: Will Smith

Language: English 

Runtime: 101 min
 


After the outbreak of a lethal virus in 2009, in 2012 U.S. Army virologist Lieutenant Colonel Robert Neville (Will Smith) is left as the last healthy human along with his trusty dog in New York City and possibly the entire world. For three years, Neville is trying to discover a cure for this disease and to find out if any other people might have also survived. But most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, perhaps mankind&#039;s last, best hope, Neville is driven by only one remaining mission: to find a way to reverse the effects of the virus using his own immune blood. But his blood is also what The Infected hunt, and Neville knows he is outnumbered and quickly running out of time.


Excellent Quality :)
